name: ProducerType
title: Producer Type
description: Subtypes of producers based on their distribution role and relationship to the carrier.

concept.definition: The agent who originates and writes the business.
The agent responsible for ongoing policy service and client relationship, who may differ from the producing agent.
A downstream agent operating under the appointment of another producing agent.
An intermediary who places business between retail brokers and carriers, typically for specialty or hard-to-place accounts.
An agent who represents multiple carriers and is not contractually bound to write exclusively with one.
An agent who writes exclusively or primarily for a single carrier.
